content.text:
[@pztrn](@iakmd9A9jQejsqrzuCu4HkmjsCSFRnVtDmNP3rz825s=.ed25519) 

I spent some time yesterday to give you a foothold on font customization. There should be enough there for you to hack in your own font choice(s), or if you'd like to contribute I'd love to see a way to set a custom font from settings UI. Excited to see what you do with it!

https://github.com/ssbc/patchwork/pull/846
